mapper.insert: insert into LectureReport(LectureReport_no, Curriculum_no, Subject, Content, Teacher, ETC, Period, ClassDate) values (#{lectureReport_no}, #{curriculum_no}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{teacher}, #{eTC}, #{period}, #{classDate}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE Curriculum_no=#{curriculum_no}, Subject=#{subject}, Content=#{content}, Teacher=#{teacher}, ETC=#{eTC}, Period=#{period}, ClassDate=#{classDate}
